name: DeepBlue (TheGamerUrso)
description:
In an ocean far far away there are two dolphins who are in love. Deep and Blue would share a morning swim together, a lovely lunch together under the hot sun. They enjoy going out of the water from time to time to get some fresh air.

Kro, an old mysterious beast lives in the depth of the sea was suddenly awoken by a sound of the two nearby unaware dolphins. Without any warning he kidnapped Deep’s girlfriend Blue. It is now up to Deep to find his way out and find her before escaping from Kro’s grasp.

An Platform Game Inspired by the "Submerged" theme for #gamedevjongamejam6. #gamedevhq6 #platformer

HO TO PAY
WASD to move around

Space to click though dialogue

Find and Collect Items

Avoid Enemies

Find your Love One
